connector.description:
Consume objects from Google Cloud Storage.

You must encode the `serviceAccountKey` property before you pass it as a parameter.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.buck.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.bucketNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.buck.description: The Google Cloud Storage bucket name or Bucket Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.serv.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.serviceAccountKey
camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.serv.description: The service account key to use as credentials for Google Cloud Storage access. You must encode this value in base64.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.dele.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.deleteAfterRead
camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.dele.description: Specifies to delete objects after consuming them.

camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.auto.name: camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.autoCreateBucket
camel.kamelet.google-storage-source.auto.description: Specifies to automatically create the Google Cloud Storage bucket.
